work.name: Secmation
highlights: Planned and implemented 20% of a backend for a programming environment with Python
Outlined an API for the programming environment backend using AsyncAPI
Containerized the programming environment backend using Docker for scalability and ease of use

work.name: Faithlife
highlights: Converted the OAuth application management portal from being user specific to a group-based system
Integrated a HaveIBeenPwned check using the k-anonymity API
